## EventRouter.on() method

Register a listener for a specific event type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
on<TEventType extends keyof EventPayloads>(eventType: TEventType, listener: (payload: EventPayloads[TEventType]) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

eventType


</td><td>

TEventType


</td><td>

The type of event to listen for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

listener


</td><td>

(payload: [EventPayloads](./server.eventpayloads.md)<!-- -->\[TEventType\]) =&gt; void


</td><td>

The listener function to invoke when the event is emitted.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Listeners are invoked in the order they are registered.
